Attribute.AttributeName: System.Windows.Markup.ContentProperty("Arguments")

summary.span: 表示 屬性。

span.span: Represents a property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這代表的結構描述資訊 （名稱、 允許的值，等等）屬性。This represents the schema information (name, allowed values, and so on) of a property. 因為這是只要結構描述資訊時，沒有任何欄位，例如 「 值 」，來取得/設定這個屬性的值。Because this is just schema information, there is no field such as "Value" to get/set the value of this property. 如果您以手動方式執行個體化這個類別，呼叫設定第一個物件的屬性之前和設定的最後一個屬性之後。If you manually instantiate this class, call before you set the first property of the object and after you set the last property.

summary.span: 取得或設定這個屬性所屬之類別的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the category to which this property belongs.

value.span: 這個屬性所屬的類別名稱。

span.span: The name of the category to which this property belongs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個欄位的值不符`Name`的屬性定義中包含的項目類別，預設值，具有這個名稱是自動產生且新增至包含類別。If the value of this field does not correspond to the `Name` property of a element that is defined in the containing class, a default that has this name is auto-generated and added to the containing class. 此欄位是選擇性的而且是文化特性而異。This field is optional and is culture-invariant. 當未指定此欄位時，這個屬性會新增至自動產生類別名為一般 （已當地語系化）。When this field is not specified, this property is added to an auto-generated category named General (localized). 這個欄位不能設定為空字串。This field cannot be set to the empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果資料來源定義，它會覆寫屬性包含。If the data source is defined, it overrides the property on the containing . 此為必要欄位只有當父沒有初始化資料來源。This field is mandatory only if the parent does not have the data source initialized. 只會傳回這個屬性的 getter直接在此設定執行個體。The getter for this property returns only the that is set directly on this instance.

summary.span: 取得或設定命令列建構函式是否在命令列中併入這個屬性的提示。

span.span: Gets or sets a hint to the command-line constructor whether to include this property in the command line.

value.span: 此命令列建構函式的提示。

span.span: The hint to the command-line constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有些屬性只能由目標，並不是要包含在命令列中。Some properties are used only by the targets and are not to be included in the command line. 其他屬性，例如，工作參數，會包含在命令列參數/值，它們所發出的形式。Other properties, for example, task parameters, are included in the command line in the form of the switch/value that they emit. 此欄位會是選擇性的且根據預設，其值`true`。This field is optional and, by default, has the value `true`.
